comment: The Legendre symbol at a square is equal to ` 1 ` . Together with ~ lgsmod this implies that the Legendre symbol takes value ` 1 ` at every quadratic residue. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Feb-2015.) (Revised by AV, 20-Jul-2021.)
